citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:41pm on 7
December, 2022. Called & spoke to facility representative, out of town and unavailable for inspection today. Discussed
attempted inspection and optimal hours.
End Section
